statements: SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis_data;
SELECT customer_id, timestamp, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis_data;
SELECT id, feedback FROM sentiment_analysis_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT customer_id, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis_data WHERE feedback LIKE '%good%';
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis_data WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000' AND sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, sentiment_score, feedback FROM sentiment_analysis_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND sentiment_score BETWEEN 0.3 AND 0.7 ORDER BY sentiment_score ASC
SELECT customer_id, AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_sentiment FROM sentiment_analysis_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_sentiment > 0.5 ORDER BY avg_sentiment DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_feedback, MAX(sentiment_score) AS max_score FROM sentiment_analysis_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-02-01'
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis_data WHERE feedback LIKE '%great%' OR feedback LIKE '%excellent%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, customer_id, sentiment_score, analysis_date FROM SentimentAnalysisData;
SELECT customer_id, sentiment_score, analysis_date, id FROM SentimentAnalysisData;
SELECT sentiment_score, id, analysis_date, customer_id FROM SentimentAnalysisData;
SELECT customer_id, sentiment_score, analysis_date FROM SentimentAnalysisData WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSatisfaction;
SELECT id, sentiment_score, analysis_date FROM SentimentAnalysisData WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT * FROM CustomerSatisfaction WHERE satisfaction_level > 0.5 ORDER BY satisfaction_date DESC
SELECT MAX(sentiment_score) AS max_score FROM SentimentAnalysisData
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(id) AS total_records FROM SentimentAnalysisData GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT customer_id, ROUND(AVG(satisfaction_level), 2) AS avg_satisfaction FROM CustomerSatisfaction
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT MAX(satisfaction_level) AS max_satisfaction_level FROM satisfaction_levels;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis_data GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM satisfaction_levels WHERE date = '2023-05-15';
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_data WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' AND customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM satisfaction_levels WHERE satisfaction_level > 0.8);

SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number, date FROM customer_data JOIN satisfaction_levels ON customer_data.customer_id = satisfaction_levels.customer_id WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_score FROM sentiment_analysis_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(sentiment_score) < 0.3 ORDER BY avg_score ASC;

SELECT customer_name, satisfaction_level FROM customer_data JOIN satisfaction_levels ON customer_data.customer_id = satisfaction_levels.customer_id WHERE satisfaction_level BETWEEN 0.6 AND 0.8 ORDER BY satisfaction_level DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_data;
SELECT customer_id, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_data ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT customer_name FROM customer_records WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT sentiment_type, analysis_date FROM sentiment_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT satisfaction_value, feedback_text FROM satisfaction_levels WHERE satisfaction_id BETWEEN 1 AND 10;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer_records WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT id, timestamp, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sentiment_type, analysis_date FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_value, feedback_text FROM satisfaction_levels WHERE satisfaction_value < 3 ORDER BY satisfaction_value ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, analysis_date FROM customer_records cr JOIN sentiment_analysis sa ON cr.customer_id = sa.analysis_id;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis_data WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_profile WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT MAX(sentiment_score) AS max_score FROM sentiment_analysis_data;
SELECT * FROM customer_satisfaction WHERE satisfaction_level > 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_score FROM sentiment_analysis_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(sentiment_score) > 0.7 ORDER BY avg_score DESC;

SELECT sentiment_scores_history.customer_id, customer_profile.customer_name, customer_profile.email FROM sentiment_scores_history JOIN customer_profile ON sentiment_scores_history.customer_id = customer_profile.customer_id WHERE sentiment_scores_history.sentiment_score < 0.3 ORDER BY customer_profile.customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_satisfaction WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_profile WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%') ORDER BY satisfaction_level DESC, timestamp ASC;
